languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, я сразу к делу — помогите мне найти эту дверь. Без шуток, это вопрос жизни и смерти. Чуйка говорит мне, что вот он — мой последний шанс с силами моими разобраться, а иначе..." {n}Она умолкает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, я сразу к делу — помогите мне найти эту дверь. Без шуток, это вопрос жизни и смерти. Чуйка говорит мне, что вот он — мой последний шанс с силами моими разобраться, а иначе..." {n}Она проводит пальцем по горлу, высунув язык.{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Captain, I'll cut to the chase: please help me find that door. I'm not joking, this is a matter of life and death. My gut tells me it's my last chance to deal with my powers, and if I don't..." {n}She trails off.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, я сразу к делу — помогите мне найти эту дверь. Без шуток, это вопрос жизни и смерти. Чуйка говорит мне, что вот он — мой последний шанс с силами моими разобраться, а иначе..." {n}Она умолкает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I'll cut to the case: please help me find that door. I'm not joking, this is a matter of life and death. My gut tells me it's my last chance to get my powers sorted, and if I don't..." {n}She trails off.{/n}

"Lord Captain, I'll cut to the case: please help me find that door. I'm not joking, this is a matter of life and death. My gut tells me it's my last chance to get my powers sorted, and if I don't..." {n}She trails off.{/n}

"Lord Captain, I'll cut to the chase: please help me find that door. I'm not joking, this is a matter of life and death. My gut tells me it's my last chance to deal with my powers, and if I don't..." {n}She trails off.{/n}

"Lord Captain, I'll cut to the chase: please help me find that door. I'm not joking, this is a matter of life and death. My gut tells me it's my last chance to deal with my powers, and if I don't..." {n}She trails off.{/n}

"Lord Captain, I'll cut to the chase: please help me find that door. I'm not joking, this is a matter of life and death. My gut tells me it's my last chance to deal with my powers, and if I don't..." {n}She trails off.{/n}

languages.text: “舰长大人，我就直说了吧，请帮我找到那扇门。我不是在和你开玩笑，这是生死攸关的大事。我的直觉告诉我，我只有这最后的机会来对付我的能力了，如果我不抓住这个机会……”{n}她的声音越来越低。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'll cut to the chase: please help me find that door. I'm not joking, this is a matter of life and death. My gut tells me it's my last chance to deal with my powers, and if I don't..." {n}She trails off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我就直说了吧，请帮我找到那扇门。我不是在和你开玩笑，这是生死攸关的大事。我的直觉告诉我，我只有这最后的机会来对付我的能力了，如果我不抓住这个机会……”{n}她的声音越来越低。{/n}

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, iré al grano: ayúdeme a encontrar esa puerta, se lo ruego. No es broma; es un tema de vida o muerte. Mi instinto me dice que es mi última oportunidad de hacer algo respecto a mis poderes, y, de desperdiciarla...». {n}Deja la frase en el aire.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'll cut to the chase: please help me find that door. I'm not joking, this is a matter of life and death. My gut tells me it's my last chance to deal with my powers, and if I don't..." {n}She trails off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, iré al grano: ayúdeme a encontrar esa puerta, se lo ruego. No es broma; es un tema de vida o muerte. Mi instinto me dice que es mi última oportunidad de hacer algo respecto a mis poderes, y, de desperdiciarla...». {n}Deja la frase en el aire.{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich komme direkt zur Sache: Bitte helft mir, diese Tür zu finden. Ich meine es ernst, es geht um Leben und Tod. Mein Bauchgefühl sagt mir, dass dies meine letzte Chance ist, mit meinen Kräften fertigzuwerden, und wenn ich das nicht tue ..." {n}Sie vollendet den Satz nicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'll cut to the chase: please help me find that door. I'm not joking, this is a matter of life and death. My gut tells me it's my last chance to deal with my powers, and if I don't..." {n}She trails off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ich komme direkt zur Sache: Bitte helft mir, diese Tür zu finden. Ich meine es ernst, es geht um Leben und Tod. Mein Bauchgefühl sagt mir, dass dies meine letzte Chance ist, mit meinen Kräften fertigzuwerden, und wenn ich das nicht tue ..." {n}Sie vollendet den Satz nicht.{/n}

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、要点を言うわ。その扉を見つけるのを手伝ってほしいの。冗談じゃなく、生死に関わる問題なのよ。あたいの力をどうにかする最後のチャンスだと直感したの。これを逃せば…」{n}彼女はそこで言葉を切った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'll cut to the chase: please help me find that door. I'm not joking, this is a matter of life and death. My gut tells me it's my last chance to deal with my powers, and if I don't..." {n}She trails off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、要点を言うわ。その扉を見つけるのを手伝ってほしいの。冗談じゃなく、生死に関わる問題なのよ。あたいの力をどうにかする最後のチャンスだと直感したの。これを逃せば…」{n}彼女はそこで言葉を切った。{/n}

languages.text: « Permettez-moi d'aller droit au but, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} : aidez-moi à trouver cette porte, je vous prie. C'est une question de vie ou de mort. Mon instinct me dit que c'est ma dernière chance de contrôler mes pouvoirs, et si je la laisse passer... » {n}Elle s'interrompt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'll cut to the chase: please help me find that door. I'm not joking, this is a matter of life and death. My gut tells me it's my last chance to deal with my powers, and if I don't..." {n}She trails off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Permettez-moi d'aller droit au but, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} : aidez-moi à trouver cette porte, je vous prie. C'est une question de vie ou de mort. Mon instinct me dit que c'est ma dernière chance de contrôler mes pouvoirs, et si je la laisse passer... » {n}Elle s'interrompt.{/n}

languages.text: "Sadede geliyorum Lord Kaptan. Lütfen o kapıyı bulmama yardım et. Şaka yapmıyorum, bu resmen ölüm kalım meselesi. İçimden bir ses, bunun güçlerimi kontrol etmek için son şansım olduğunu söylüyor. Bunu yapmazsam..." {n}İdira, cümlesinin sonunu getirmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'll cut to the chase: please help me find that door. I'm not joking, this is a matter of life and death. My gut tells me it's my last chance to deal with my powers, and if I don't..." {n}She trails off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, sadede geleceğim. Lütfen o kapıyı bulmama yardım et. Şaka yapmıyorum, ölüm kalım meselesi bu. İçimden bir ses bunun güçlerimi kontrol etmek için son şansım olduğunu söylüyor. Bunu yapmazsam..." {n}İdira, cümlesinin sonunu getirmiyor.{/n}
